participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Romantic and family-oriented, enjoys sharing her happiness with others.
participant_1.background: I stay away from clowns and eat my favorite blue jello. I enjoy racing go karts and driving my classic car. My pets are always there to listen to me when I need to vent my feelings. I proposed to my significant other on my last vacation. I enjoy cooking and baking.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Supportive and optimistic, always encourages friends to pursue their dreams.
participant_2.background: I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples. I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day. I saved up my allowance for months to buy a Bruno Mars CD when I was 12 years old. I am proud of my first home purchase. I like to listen to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward despite my circumstances.

content.text: I just got back from my vacation. I proposed to my significant other and they said yes!
Congratulations! That's wonderful news. What was the proposal like?
I took them to the beach at sunset and proposed there. It was really beautiful.
That sounds amazing. I'm sure they were thrilled.
Yeah, they were really happy. I'm so excited to start planning our wedding.
That's great. I'm sure it will be a beautiful ceremony.
Thanks. I'm really looking forward to it.
I'm sure it will be a lot of fun. What kind of music are you planning to play at the reception?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about something upbeat and fun.
That sounds like a good idea. It will set the mood for a great party.
Well, I'm sure it will be a beautiful wedding. Congratulations again.
